page.title: 16THE ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND
page.content: The Adventure Playground has been on the present site since 1980.It has a building and land over two acres which is plenty of playing space,in which lots of activities take place. Children can do art and craft,cooking, gardening,painting and den building. The site is supervised at all times by the play leaders so that nothing can go wrong.It is not a club and there is no membership.They make no charges except for swimming and cooking.It is in the middle of Park Springs Estate so most of the children come from Park Springs but some come from town and villages nearby.The holidays are the busiest times,but the playground is open all year round.During the holidays hot meals for the children are provided at very low costs.Money is raised by outings.
